This option is used only in remote operations that use the HTTPS protocol." required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Skip CN Check</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_WRM_CN_CHECKs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Specifies that the certificate common name (CN) of the server does not have to match the host name of the server. This option is used only in remote operations that use the HTTPS protocol.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="initvalue"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_WRM_CA_CHECKs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Skip CA Check" tooltip="Specifies that when it connects over HTTPS, the client does not validate that the server certificate is signed by a trusted certification authority (CA)." required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Skip CA Check</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_WRM_CA_CHECKs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Specifies that when it connects over HTTPS, the client does not validate that the server certificate is signed by a trusted certification authority (CA).</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="initvalue"/></properties></dynradiogroup></readpanel></dialog>
